name: nuclide-python
description: Provides support for Python in Nuclide

autocompleteArguments.title: Autocomplete arguments
autocompleteArguments.description: Autocomplete arguments for functions and classes.

includeOptionalArguments.title: Include optional arguments during autocomplete
includeOptionalArguments.description: Include optional arguments in autocomplete results, including keyword arguments with default values and placeholders such as *args, **kwargs, *.

pathToPython.title: Path to Python Executable
pathToPython.description: Absolute path to the python executable on your system.

enableLinting.title: Lint code with Flake8
enableLinting.description: Show lint messages from flake8 with python files. Requires a valid flake8 path to be set.

lintExtensionBlacklist.title: Lint extension blacklist
lintExtensionBlacklist.description: File extensions that should not be linted with flake8.

lintOnFly.title: Lint on the fly
lintOnFly.description: Lint code on the fly, refreshing whenever the file contents are changed rather than when files are saved. Requires restarting Nuclide to take effect.

pathToFlake8.title: Path to Flake8 Executable
pathToFlake8.description: Absolute path to the flake8 linter executable on your system.

showGlobalVariables.title: Show global variables
showGlobalVariables.description: Show assignments to all global variables.
